sentences.sentence: When it was quite dark the owners( 主人 ) of the cottage( 小屋 ) came back.
They were seven dwarfs( 小矮人 ) who dug in the mountains for gold.
They lit their seven candles, and as it was now light within the cottage they saw that someone had been there, because nothing was in the same place as they had left it.
The first said, “Who’s been sitting on my chair?”
The second, “Who’s been eating off my plate( 盘子 )?”
The third, “Who’s been eating my bread?”
The fourth, “Who’s been eating my porridge( 麦片粥 )?”
The fifth, “Who’s been using my fork?”
The sixth, “Who’s been cutting with my knife?”
The seventh, “Who’s been drinking out of my glass?”
Then the first looked round and saw that there was a little hollow( 凹陷的 ) place in his bed, and he said, “Who’s been getting into my bed?”
The others came up and each called out, “Somebody’s been lying in my bed too.”
But when the seventh looked at his bed, he saw little Snow White, who was lying asleep in it.
And he called the others, who came running up, and they cried out with astonishment( 惊讶 ), and brought their seven little candles and let the light fall on little Snow White.
“Oh, heavens( 天哪 )! Oh, heavens!” they cried. “What a lovely child!”
And they were so happy that they did not wake her up, but let her sleep in the bed.
And the seventh dwarf slept with the other dwarfs, one hour with each, and so got through( 度过 ) the night.
When it was morning little Snow White awoke, and was frightened( 害怕的 ) when she saw the seven dwarfs.
But they were friendly and asked her what her name was.
“My name is Snow White,” she answered.
“How did you come to be in our house?” asked the dwarfs.
Then she told them that her stepmother( 继母 ) had wished to have her killed, but that the huntsman( 猎人 ) had spared her life,
and that she had run for the whole day, until at last she had found their cottage.

The dwarfs said, “If you will take care of our house, cook, make the beds, wash, sew( 做针线活 ), and knit( 编织 ), and if you will keep everything neat( 整洁的 ) and clean, you can stay with us and lack nothing.”
“Yes,” said Snow White, “with all my heart,” and she stayed with them.
She kept the house in order for them.
In the mornings they went to the mountains and dug for gold.
In the evenings they came back, and then their supper( 晚餐 ) had to be ready.
The girl was alone the whole day, so the good dwarfs warned her and said, “Beware( 提防 ) of your stepmother( 继母 ), she will soon know that you are here.
Be sure to let no one come in.”
But the Queen, believing that she had eaten Snow White’s heart, felt quite sure that she was again the first and most beautiful of all.
So she went to her mirror( 镜子 ) and said:
“Mirror, mirror, on the wall,
Who is the fairest of us all?”
And the mirror answered:
“Queen, you are the fairest of all I see,
But over the hills, where the seven dwarfs dwell( 居住 ),
Snow White is still alive and well,
And none is as fair as she.”
Then she was astonished( 震惊的 ), for she knew that the mirror never lied.
She knew that the huntsman( 猎人 ) had disobeyed( 违抗 ) her, and that little Snow White was still alive.
And so she thought and thought again how she might kill Snow White.
Now she knew that she was not the fairest in the whole land, envy( 嫉妒 ) let her have no rest.
At last she thought of a plan.
She painted her face, and dressed herself like an old woman selling things from door to door.
No one could have recognized( 认出 ) her as the Queen.
In this disguise( 伪装 ) she went over the seven mountains to the seven dwarfs, and knocked at the door and cried, “Pretty things to sell, very cheap, very cheap.”
Little Snow White looked out of the window and called out, “Good day my good woman, what have you to sell?”
“Good things, pretty things,” she answered, “corset( 紧身褡 ) laces( 花边 ) of all colors,” and she pulled out one which was made of bright-colored silk.
“I may let this harmless old woman in,” thought Snow White, and she opened the door and bought the pretty laces.
“Child,” said the old woman, “you do not look as slim( 苗条的 ) and pretty as you should.
Let me lace( 用系带束紧 ) you up properly for once.”
Snow White had no suspicion( 怀疑 ), but stood before her, and let herself be laced with the new laces.
But the old woman laced so quickly and so tightly( 紧地 ) that Snow White lost her breath( 呼吸 ) and fell down as if dead.
“Now you are no longer ‘the fairest of us all’, ” said the Queen, and ran away.

article_info.previous: 王后生下白雪公主后就过世了，国王又娶了一个新王后。恶毒的王后自诩为世界上最美貌的女人，当知道白雪公主比她更美丽时，便心生嫉恨并命令猎人杀掉白雪公主。猎人心生不忍，白雪公主逃过一劫，无意闯进了一座小屋。
article_info.share_words: And they were so happy that they did not wake her up, but let her sleep in the bed. And the seventh dwarf slept with the other dwarfs, one hour with each, and so got through the night.

question.cn: 七个小矮人是怎么知道有人在他们不在家的时候来过了呢？
question.en: How did the seven dwarfs know that someone had been inside the cottage when they were away?

options.cn: 所有的东西都不在原位了。
options.en: Nothing was in the same place as they had left it.
There were broken plates on the ground.

analysis: 文中提到：“They lit their seven candles, and as it was now light within the cottage they saw that someone had been there, because nothing was in the same place as they had left it.”因此答案选A。

question.cn: 在什么条件下“白雪公主”才可以留在小矮人们的家里呢？
question.en: On what condition could “Snow White” stay in the dwarfs’ home?

options.cn: 她必须保持房子里的一切都井然有序。
options.en: She must keep the house in order for them.
She must make food for them.

analysis: 文中提到：“The dwarfs said, “If you will take care of our house, cook, make the beds, wash, sew, and knit, and if you will keep everything neat and clean, you can stay with us and lack nothing.” “Yes,” said Snow White, “with all my heart,” and she stayed with them.”因此答案选C。

question.cn: 当恶毒的王后知道“白雪公主”仍然活着时，决定做什么？
question.en: What did the wicked Queen decide to do after she found “Snow White” was still alive？

options.cn: 她阴谋再次杀掉“白雪公主”。
options.en: She plotted to kill “Snow White” again.

options.cn: 她决定和“白雪公主”和解。
options.en: She decided to make peace with “Snow White”.

analysis: 文中提到：“And so she thought and thought again how she might kill Snow White.”因此答案选A。

share_title: 100天读完3本英文书，今天是第73天
